review: Didn't work for Netflix had sound but no picture. Sent it back
author: Kimberly A Carlson

review: I love my Fire TV Stick!This is a very affordable way to add viewing options to your TV, if you don't have a "smart" tv that already has internet/wireless capabilities. The stick was very easy to use, I loved the instructional tutorial that starts up right away. Connected easily with my wireless internet. The remote worked well, and I'm very pleased at the variety of options!Thank you Amazon, love my Fire!
author: KimMart

review: Still learning what I have. There was basically no installation. Very easy to get going.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great little device! Much more affordable than others with better quality. Amazon had done it again!
author: Jalene Vasquez
